ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: We covered a lot of warm-ups and techniques to help an actor step into a character. It was really interesting!
This course teaches us elementary skills in building a relationship with our character.

I learned how to make intentional choices in not just performing a character, but creating and shaping one. I learned about the importance of intention in performance and how to engage effectively with a fellow actor. I gained skills in breaking down a story and making prepared decisions while remaining flexible and open during the performance.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The class was great. Greg really took the note that warm-ups were needed for an 8:25a class from past reviews. We did them every morning! The small size was really nice because it meant everyone was given a sizable amount of time to work with Greg, too.
This course was strong in that it provided enough time for each student to be heard.

I personally really enjoyed this class and found it very helpful to work the way we did. The class is structured around performances, where scenes are performed every class and the rest o the time is spent watching the other performances. I found myself learning not just from the critiques and suggestions directed towards me, but also from the other actors in the scenes.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes! If you are given the opportunity to take this class, I highly highly recommend taking it. Greg is a great teacher and I feel very lucky to have been able to work with him.
I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a rigorous acting class where they can really work on their skills!
